## Introduction

I am going to examine the usage of AI related packages in R, to see if I
can teach better stuff and if they can help make tasks in Art/Design,
and in Business, easier to execute.

## Setting up the Packages


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(ellmer)
library(ollamar)
```
